price: 18. Ir Allahas padaro Ajat (įrodymus, įkalčius, eilutes, pamokas, ženklus, apreiškimus ir t. t.) aiškius jums, ir Allahas yra Visa Žinantis, Visa Išmanantis.
arabic: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
